author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Match the namespace between ddd and dd4hep for ECAL barrel algo

#### PR validation:

Tested by comparing the namespace of all volumes created by Ecal barrel algorithm in DDD and DD4Hep

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-gex50 Match the namespace between ddd and dd4hep for ECAL barrel algo
